doc: The pathname to the (SDF) file with the chemical system to work with.
The pathname to the file with the reference chemical system. Only SDF files with ONE molecule are acceptable.
The pathname to the file where to print results.
The pathname to the output file where the aligned geometry will be saved.
SMARTS query identifying the atoms on which the analysis will focus.
Sets the amount of log messages. Values larger than 0 will make the worker write more and more detailed log reports.
